name: Ergo
long_description:
Our Mission is to free every sales team from busywork so they can focus on what matters: building relationships and closing deals. Ergo turns unstructured conversations across platforms like Zoom, email, Slack, and phone into clean CRM data, proactive follow‑ups, and real‑time insights to maximize your funnel without lifting a finger.

Some of the fastest‑growing companies like Rho, Delve, Whop, Sully.ai, and Greptile trust Ergo to help their revenue engines scale. Read tetimonials below:



"Ergo takes care of the busywork so I can focus on selling and building relationships. It keeps everything moving without anything slipping through the cracks."

Connor Quimby 
Senior Account Executive, Rho


"Ergo is the best product we’ve used this year. Besides saving reps 10h per week, it unlocks new revenue and teaches reps how to improve with proactive insights.”

Karun Kaushik 
Co‑founder and CEO, Delve


"We use this at Greptile, it's really good! It auto‑updates our CRM from meetings, emails and makes it impossible to forget a follow‑up."

Daksh Gupta 
Co‑founder and CEO, Greptile
one_liner: Ergo is an AI Sales Co-pilot
